game.name: Journey to Eden
game.shortDescription: Lead your squad on a desperate journey to Eden in this minimalist sci-fi roguelike. Customize your agents with talent trees, scavenge for gear, and survive high-stakes battles where defeat means the permanent deletion of your entire squad. You are not prepared.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lead your squad on a desperate journey to Eden in this minimalist sci-fi roguelike. Customize your agents with talent trees, scavenge for gear, and survive high-stakes battles where defeat means the permanent deletion of your entire squad. You are not prepared.
